content.en: Improved Parathyroid Localization: Researchers have been investigating the use of different imaging techniques to improve the localization of parathyroid adenomas and hyperplastic parathyroids in patients with primary hyperparathyroidism. These studies have found that algorithms, such as change detection and iterative reconstruction algorithms, can optimize the accuracy and image quality of these imaging procedures. Additionally, algorithms used in SPECT-CT and subtraction SPECT/CT have been shown to improve the detection and localization of hyperfunctioning parathyroid glands.
content.da: Forbedret Parathyreoidealokalisering: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af forskellige billedteknikker til at forbedre lokaliseringen af parathyreoideadenomer og hyperplastiske parathyreoider hos patienter med primær hyperparathyreoidisme. Disse studier har vist, at algoritmer såsom ændringsdetektion og iterative rekonstruktionsalgoritmer kan optimere nøjagtigheden og billedkvaliteten af disse billeddannelsesprocedurer. Desuden har algoritmer brugt i SPECT-CT og subtraktions-SPECT/CT vist sig at forbedre påvisningen og lokaliseringen af hyperfunktionelle parathyreoidekirtler.
